summary.span: 实现 GenerateDeploymentManifest 任务。

span.span: Implements the GenerateDeploymentManifest task.

summary.span: 使用项目文件中的 GenerateDeploymentManifest 元素创建和执行此任务。

span.span: Use the GenerateDeploymentManifest element in the project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: 有关用法和参数信息，请参阅 [GenerateDeploymentManifest 任务](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0734ebda-734d-49c4-9642-8d9d919d45fd)。

span.span: For usage and parameter information, see [GenerateDeploymentManifest Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0734ebda-734d-49c4-9642-8d9d919d45fd).

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序的更新位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the update location for the application.
The update location for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定此属性，应用程序定义没有更新位置。If this property is not specified, no update location is defined for the application. 但是，如果属性是`true`，必须指定更新位置。However, if the property is `true`, an update location must be specified. 指定的值应为完全限定的 URL 或 UNC 路径。The specified value should be a fully qualified URL or UNC path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 `false`。The default value is `false`. 此属性仅适用于属性值是`true`。This property applies only when the property value is `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示应用程序是已安装应用程序还是仅联机应用程序。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean that indicates whether the application is an installed application or an online-only application.

value.span: 如果应用程序安装在本地计算机上，并且可以通过使用移除**添加或删除程序**对话框;如果应用程序是用于在网页上联机使用。

span.span: if the application is to be installed on the local computer and can be removed by using the **Add or Remove Programs** dialog box; if the application is for online use from a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`.

value.span: 如果使用 .deploy 文件扩展名发布每一个程序文件，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此选项对于 Web 服务器安全性来限制的文件扩展名，必须先取消阻止，若要启用的数量[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序部署。Use this option for Web server security to limit the number of file name extensions that must be unblocked to enable [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application deployment. 默认值为 `false`。The default value is `false`.

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application.
The name of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定此属性，生成的清单的标识中推断名称。If this property is not specified, the name is inferred from the identity of the generated manifest. 该名称将用作“开始”菜单上的快捷名称，且将作为“添加或删除程序”对话框中显示的名称的一部分。This name is used for the shortcut name on the **Start** menu and is part of the name that appears in the **Add or Remove Programs** dialog box.

The publisher of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定此属性，从已注册的用户或生成的清单的标识中推断出名称。If this property is not specified, the name is inferred from the registered user, or the identity of the generated manifest. 此名称用于在文件夹名称**启动**菜单，是在显示的名称的一部分**卸载或更改程序**对话框。This name is used for the folder name on the **Start** menu and is part of the name that appears in the **Uninstall or change a program** dialog box.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示是否应检查更新。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether updates should be checked.

summary.span: 可在应用程序启动前（在前台）、或在应用程序运行时（在后台）检查更新。

span.span: Updates can be checked before the application is started (in the foreground), or when the application is running (in the background).

value.span: 如果应检查更新，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if updates should be checked; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以具有以下值：This property can have the following values: - `Foreground` （在之前启动应用程序）`Foreground` (before the application is started) - `Background` （该应用程序运行时）`Background` (when the application is running) 默认值为 `Background`。The default value is `Background`. 此属性仅适用时的值并两个属性均`true`。This property only applies when the values of the and properties are both `true`.
